thread.title: Canton PD gets new support services head
thread.title_full: Canton PD gets new support services head | www.ajc.com

author: Mark Woolsey
title: Canton PD gets new support services head
text:
The Canton Police Department has hired a new captain to head its support services bureau.
Wendell Turner has a more than 20 years in law enforcement, most recently serving as director of public safety in Statesboro, heading both the police and fire departments in the south Georgia community. Turner holds several Georgia Peace Officer and Training Council certifications, including training and managerial stripes.
Turner will be sworn in Oct. 15 at city hall, and will take up his new duties Oct. 21.
Wendell Turner
